answer:
Tips for locating immunization records are here. If you are unable to find any of your records, you are considered unimmunized. There are recommended vaccines for adults Not Immunized in Childhood. Publicly funded (Free) vaccines are available from most pharmacies, some doctors' offices and local health units. Use the health unit finder. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Tips for locating immunization records are here.

If you are unable to find any of your records, you are considered unimmunized.
There are recommended vaccines for adults Not Immunized in Childhood.
Publicly funded (Free) vaccines are available from most pharmacies, some doctors' offices and local health units.

## Use the health unit finder.

Immunization Nurse
question: I am female 23y/o. Unfortunately I've lost my vaccination record, and can't remember what I have got, so I want to get vaccinated again. What vaccine is recommended for retake?
question_variation_0: what vaccine should be retaken before getting vaccinated again
question_variation_1: what vaccine do you retake if you forgot to vaccinate again
question_variation_2: how much vaccines should be retaken
